ygData.subject: Re: [OT] Brewing, Pottery and the Norrath economy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Granted my husbands ranger character made my bards patchwork for me (the fathest I ve gone as far as twinking on any of my characters) but I never had any
ygData.messageBody:
>After fighting my way up to level 11, mostly solo, and barely getting
>enough plat to afford my songs at each level, I was told that I should
>work on trade skills to make the money I needed. Ok, that's well and
>good then.
>

Granted my husbands ranger character made my bards patchwork for me (the
fathest I've gone as far as twinking on any of my characters) but I never
had any trouble making enough coin to stay ahead of myself in spells by at
least two levels, and I soloed almost exclusively until I hit 10th or so.
Spent a little time here and there with the group that has become my regular
party, and granted Liani's betrothed gave her a combine long sword as a
betrothal present at 15th level or so, but everything I see on this list
confuses the heck out of me.

Money has NEVER been a problem for me... though granted I've never seen more
than 50 platinum in any one place and it boggles my mind to see people
buying things through auction for 1000 plat or more.... what has been a
problem for ME is levelling. Partied with my friends I have ALOT of fun but
I rarely get much of the experience from any given series of kills... which
only gets worse because they keep getting farther and farther ahead of me...
and since 12th level I've been virtually incapable of soloing much of
anything that gives me experience without getting my butt killed. I've been
playing this game since the first week it went public, and I've been playing
my bard since the very day that the Bristlebane server opened... and she is
only 16th level.. about two bubbles from 17th.

So... anyone have any ideas?
